scripts.start: budo index.js:bundle.js --live -- -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 ] --plugins [ transform-flow-strip-types ] ]
scripts.test: budo test.js:bundle.js --live -- -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 ] --plugins [ transform-flow-strip-types ] ]
scripts.build: browserify index.js > build.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 ] --plugins [ transform-flow-strip-types ] ]
